stack.summary: Add schema transformer for ElevenLabs conversation exports to webhook format

fields.what: Transform ElevenLabs conversation export schema to match post-call webhook trigger format
fields.why: Enable reprocessing of historical conversations through existing post-call webhook pipeline
fields.how: Add transformation node to ElevenLabs Conversation Export workflow (5CmDvqF0GloEr7be)
fields.which: ElevenLabs Conversation Export workflow, post-call webhook consumers
fields.lest: Historical calls cannot be reprocessed, data migration blocked, audit trail unavailable
fields.measuredBy: Transformed output matches webhook schema, downstream workflows accept reprocessed calls

stack.summary: [spinal-cord] fix(hooks): Require verbatim evidence when updating issues, plans, or checklists
Implement full path validation for all Claude Code file operations

fields.who: Claude Code sessions and file operation tools
fields.what: Enforce all file paths in Claude Code operations are absolute (not relative)
fields.why: Relative paths cause ambiguity, wrong file operations, inconsistent logging, and difficult auditing
fields.how: Create PreToolUse hook that validates file_path starts with / (Unix) or drive letter (Windows)
fields.which: Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep tools - file_path parameter validation
fields.lest: Must not block valid absolute paths; must not break existing workflows
fields.with: TypeScript, hooks framework, path validation utilities
fields.measuredBy: Hook implemented for all file operation tools; cross-platform support (Unix/Windows); helpful error messages; CLAUDE.md updated
